title: MESMERIC ATTRACTION & FASCINATION / NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
Dr. Paret hypnotized his student Gica, using the technique of Fascination - the power of the gaze and Magnetic passes. His student entered in a deep hypnotic state and the result was achieved completely non-verbaly, not a single word was used. Gica participated in Dr. Paret's masterclass and learned many non-verbal hypnosis secrets and powerful technique that helped her to improve her professional work as a hypnotherapeute, as well as her connection with her deepest self. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
